args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Trump spoke with Saudi crown prince in first call with foreign leader President Donald Trump spoke Wednesday with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, his first call with a foreign leader since he was sworn in as president again. During the call, Mohammed said he wanted to pour $600 billion into trade and investments with the United States, according to the official Saudi Press Agency. They also discussed ways to promote stability in the Middle East and to combat terrorism. The White House confirmed that the call occurred but has not yet provided details about the discussion. Trump had a close relationship with the de facto Saudi ruler throughout his first term, and his first foreign trip was to Riyadh. In 2018, Trump expressed his strong support for Saudi Arabia, effectively ignoring the CIA’s conclusion that Mohammed ordered the brutal killing of Washington Post contributing columnist Jamal Khashoggi in Istanbul.
